content: following the pattern for short wave mitts that i published a while ago i wondered what it would look like if the short row sections were knitted in a different order i e making the main part look less geometrical and more „organic the basic construction is the same first a shaped thumb part is knitted then a rectangular main part is knitted - built from short row sections interspersed with garter stitch row of a different colour this pattern is also available in danish - translation thanks to marianneho 1 http //strikkeglad dk/3946/boelgevanter/ 2 1 http //www ravelry com/people/marianneho 2 http //strikkeglad dk/3946/boelgevanter/
